channel.title: 99 Agility
channel.description:
Well, i have completed 99 herblore and it cost me roughly 100m
What I'm going for now is 99 agility
News: Well now that i got hacked, ill be playing RS a lot less. 164m gone.
[November 6th]
33 agility 34 agility 35 agility 36 agility [November 7th]
37 agility 38 agility 39 agility November 8th 40 agility 41 agility
November 9th (not much done cuz of mw3) 42 agility 43 agility
November 10th
44 45 46 47 November 11th
48 49 50
Will be posting updates, Also, feel free to mention where i should train, right now im doing agility pyramid until 55ish

item.title: 99 Agility
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:11, topic:420975”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=523650.msg3809339#msg3809339 date=1320771617]
No you don’t. Just get Penance Gloves, Boots of Lightness and Spottier Cape.
[/quote]

You’re obviously pretty inexperienced. I recently went there with my spotted cape and boots of lightness at 50 agility and failed nearly constantly. In ~25 attempts to finish the course, I only had one fully completed lap (and we all know the last obstacle is the one that gives the most exp), so your exp/hr is dramatically decreased in comparison to the barbarian course.

OP: I suggest sticking to your idea of waiting until ~55 to start the ape atoll course.[/quote]I went there at the minimum requirement barely fell at all. maybe 2-3 times every 5-10 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 Agility
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

weight has very little to do with whether you succeed or not

Read full topic

item.title: 99 Agility
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

No you don’t. Just get Penance Gloves, Boots of Lightness and Spottier Cape.

You’re obviously pretty inexperienced. I recently went there with my spotted cape and boots of lightness at 50 agility and failed nearly constantly. In ~25 attempts to finish the course, I only had one fully completed lap (and we all know the last obstacle is the one that gives the most exp), so your exp/hr is dramatically decreased in comparison to the barbarian course.

OP: I suggest sticking to your idea of waiting until ~55 to start the ape atoll course.

Read full topic

tinyscape:

I’m thinking of doing 99 Agility, good luck with your 99 though!

Thanks, it’s slow from 1-85 but 85-99 is faster believe it or not. It’s boring though D:

Well if you ever go for BA, hit me up. Im a level five healer but working on other levels once i get my slayer helmet and 99 firemaking.
Will do, Pm me your RSN? :D
